bill_title: allow for a vacation home establishment and provide for municipal and county regulation thereof.

bill_versions.bill_text: An Act to allow for a vacation home establishment and provide for municipal and county regulation thereof. Be it enacted by the Legislature of the State of South Dakota: Section 1. That a NEW SECTION be added to chapter 9-19: A municipality may not adopt or enforce an ordinance or other regulation that expressly or effectively prohibits the use of a property as a vacation home establishment as defined under § 34-18-1. A municipality may adopt or enforce an ordinance or other regulation that specifically regulates property used as a vacation home establishment only if the regulations provide requirements regarding: (1) Fire and building codes; (2) Health and sanitation; (3) Traffic control; (4) Solid or hazardous waste and pollution control; or (5) The designation of an emergency contact for the property. Section 2. That a NEW SECTION be added to chapter 7-18A: A county may not adopt or enforce an ordinance or other regulation that expressly or effectively prohibits the use of a property as a vacation home establishment as defined under § 34-18-1. A county may adopt or enforce an ordinance or other regulation that specifically regulates property used as a vacation home establishment only if the regulations provide requirements regarding: (1) Fire and building codes; (2) Health and sanitation; (3) Traffic control; (4) Solid or hazardous waste and pollution control; or (5) The designation of an emergency contact for the property.
